__SqlaTable__.sql:
select count(distinct skuid) understocksku 
from demandai.vw_weekly_demand_staticweek
where
staticweekno =1
and currentstock < minstocklevel

select count(distinct skuid) from demandai.vw_demand_variation
 where 
 percentavgchg < 10

select sum(peakforecast*lastknownrrp) totalforecastamount
from  demandai.vw_sku_forecast_with_lastrrp_staticweek
 where 
 staticweekno = 0

select 'Revenue Profile' as profile,peakcategory1 as peak_category,sum(peakforecast * lastknownrrp) totalforecastsales
from demandai.vw_sku_forecast_with_lastrrp_staticweek
where staticweekno = 1 
group by peakcategory1
union
select 'Demand Profile' as profile,peakcategory2 ,sum(peakforecast * lastknownrrp) 
from demandai.vw_sku_forecast_with_lastrrp_staticweek
where staticweekno = 1 
group by peakcategory2
union
select 'Demand Profile' as profile,peakcategory3 ,sum(peakforecast * lastknownrrp) 
from demandai.vw_sku_forecast_with_lastrrp_staticweek
where staticweekno = 1 
group by peakcategory3
union
select 'Demand Profile' as profile,peakcategory4 ,sum(peakforecast * lastknownrrp) 
from demandai.vw_sku_forecast_with_lastrrp_staticweek
where staticweekno = 1 
group by peakcategory4
union
select 'Demand Profile' as profile,peakcategory5 ,sum(peakforecast * lastknownrrp) 
from demandai.vw_sku_forecast_with_lastrrp_staticweek
where staticweekno = 1 
group by peakcategory5

select sum(forecastsalesamt) from demandai.vw_demand_variation
 where 
 percentavgchg >=10

select staticweekno,weekstart,weekend,sum(wg1.demand * wg1.lastknownrrp) totalsalesamt
from 
demandai.vw_weekly_demand_staticweek wg1
where 
staticweekno between 1 and 4
group by staticweekno,weekstart,weekend

select 
demanddate,
 rollingweek,
 now()::Date - (7*rollingweek)::integer as rollingweekstart,
 now()::Date - (7*rollingweek)::integer + 6  as rollingweekend ,
 sum(currentstock * costofgoods )  sku_cost
 from demandai.vw_weekly_demand
 where rollingweek <=4 
 and demanddate= now()::Date - (7*rollingweek)::integer + 6
 group by rollingweek,demanddate
 order by demanddate desc

with postcode_sales as (
select staticweekno,weekstart,sum(demand*lastknownrrp) totalsale,postcode
from 
demandai.vw_locwise_demandsales
where 
staticweekno = 1
and postcode <> ''
group by staticweekno,weekstart,postcode
)
,
top5loc as (
select staticweekno,weekstart,postcode,totalsale,rno from 
(select staticweekno,weekstart,postcode,totalsale, rank() over( order by totalsale desc) rno
from  postcode_sales) as top5
where top5.rno <= 5
),
city_sales as (
select staticweekno,weekstart,sum(demand*lastknownrrp) totalsale,city
from 
demandai.vw_locwise_demandsales
where 
staticweekno = 1
and city <> ''
group by staticweekno,weekstart,city
)
,
top5loc_city as (
select staticweekno,weekstart,city,totalsale,rno from 
(select staticweekno,weekstart,city,totalsale, rank() over( order by totalsale desc) rno
from  city_sales) as top5
where top5.rno <= 5
)
,
state_sales as (
select staticweekno,weekstart,sum(demand*lastknownrrp) totalsale,state
from 
demandai.vw_locwise_demandsales
where 
staticweekno = 1
and state <> ''
group by staticweekno,weekstart,state
)
,
top5loc_state as (
select staticweekno,weekstart,state,totalsale,rno from 
(select staticweekno,weekstart,state,totalsale, rank() over( order by totalsale desc) rno
from  state_sales) as top5
where top5.rno <= 5
)
,
county_sales as (
select staticweekno,weekstart,sum(demand*lastknownrrp) totalsale,county
from 
demandai.vw_locwise_demandsales
where 
staticweekno = 1
and county <> ''
group by staticweekno,weekstart,county
)
,
top5loc_county as (
select staticweekno,weekstart,county,totalsale,rno from 
(select staticweekno,weekstart,county,totalsale, rank() over( order by totalsale desc) rno
from  county_sales) as top5
where top5.rno <= 5
)
,
country_sales as (
select staticweekno,weekstart,sum(demand*lastknownrrp) totalsale,country
from 
demandai.vw_locwise_demandsales
where 
staticweekno = 1
and country <> ''
group by staticweekno,weekstart,country
)
,
top5loc_country as (
select staticweekno,weekstart,country,totalsale,rno from 
(select staticweekno,weekstart,country,totalsale, rank() over( order by totalsale desc) rno
from  country_sales) as top5
where top5.rno <= 5
)
select staticweekno,weekstart,country as location ,sum(demand*lastknownrrp),'country' as type
from
demandai.vw_locwise_demandsales ld 
where 
ld.country in (select country from top5loc_country)
group by staticweekno,weekstart,country
union all
select staticweekno,weekstart,county,sum(demand*lastknownrrp),'county' as type
from
demandai.vw_locwise_demandsales ld 
where 
ld.county in (select county from top5loc_county)
group by staticweekno,weekstart,county
union all
select staticweekno,weekstart,state,sum(demand*lastknownrrp),'state' as type
from
demandai.vw_locwise_demandsales ld 
where 
ld.state in (select state from top5loc_state)
group by staticweekno,weekstart,state
union all
select staticweekno,weekstart,city,sum(demand*lastknownrrp),'city' as type
from
demandai.vw_locwise_demandsales ld 
where 
ld.city in (select city from top5loc_city)
group by staticweekno,weekstart,city
union all
select staticweekno,weekstart,postcode,sum(demand*lastknownrrp),'postcode' as type
from
demandai.vw_locwise_demandsales ld 
where 
ld.postcode in (select postcode from top5loc)
group by staticweekno,weekstart,postcode
union all
select lf.staticweekno,
lf.weekend ,lf.country,sum(lf.peakforecast*lf.lastknownrrp) totalsale,'country' as type
from 
demandai.vw_locwise_forecastsales lf 
where 
lf.country <> ''
and lf.country in (select country from top5loc_country)
group by staticweekno,weekend,country
union all
select lf.staticweekno,
lf.weekend ,lf.county,sum(lf.peakforecast*lf.lastknownrrp) totalsale,'county' as type
from 
demandai.vw_locwise_forecastsales lf 
where 
lf.county <> ''
and lf.county in (select county from top5loc_county)
group by staticweekno,weekend,county
union all
select lf.staticweekno,
lf.weekend ,lf.state,sum(lf.peakforecast*lf.lastknownrrp) totalsale,'state' as type
from 
demandai.vw_locwise_forecastsales lf 
where 
lf.state <> ''
and lf.state in (select state from top5loc_state)
group by staticweekno,weekend,state
union all
select lf.staticweekno,
lf.weekend ,lf.city,sum(lf.peakforecast*lf.lastknownrrp) totalsale,'city' as type
from 
demandai.vw_locwise_forecastsales lf 
where 
lf.city <> ''
and lf.city in (select city from top5loc_city)
group by staticweekno,weekend,city
union all
select lf.staticweekno,
lf.weekend ,lf.postcode,sum(lf.peakforecast*lf.lastknownrrp) totalsale,'postcode' as type
from 
demandai.vw_locwise_forecastsales lf 
where 
lf.postcode <> ''
and lf.postcode in (select postcode from top5loc)
group by staticweekno,weekend,postcode

select 
demanddate,
 rollingweek,
 now()::Date - (7*rollingweek)::integer as rollingweekstart,
 now()::Date - (7*rollingweek)::integer + 6  as rollingweekend ,
 count(distinct skuid)  total_sku
 from demandai.vw_weekly_demand
 where rollingweek <=4 
 and demanddate= now()::Date - (7*rollingweek)::integer + 6
 group by rollingweek,demanddate
 order by demanddate desc

with top4categoryforecastsale as 
(
select category,sum(peakforecast * lastknownrrp) forecastsale ,weekend
from 
demandai.vw_sku_forecast_with_lastrrp_staticweek sf
where 
sf.staticweekno between 0 and 1
and category in (select categorywise from demandai.vw_lastweektop4category  )
group by category,weekend
)
select category,forecastsale,weekend from top4categoryforecastsale
union
select slm.skuvariant2 as categorywise,sum(sd.demand*sd.lastknownrrp) totalsales,weekstart
FROM demandai.vw_weekly_demand_staticweek sd
 inner JOIN demandai.sku_loc_metadata slm ON slm.skuid::text = sd.skuid::text AND slm.locationid::text = sd.locationid::text
where 
slm.skustatus = true 
and sd.staticweekno between 0 and 1 
and slm.skuvariant2 in (select categorywise from demandai.vw_lastweektop4category)
group by slm.skuvariant2,weekstart

select weekstart,sum(peakforecast*lastknownrrp) totalforecastamount
from  demandai.vw_sku_forecast_with_lastrrp_staticweek
 where 
 staticweekno in (0,1)
 group by weekstart
 union
 select weekstart,sum(wg1.demand * wg1.lastknownrrp) totalsalesamt
from 
demandai.vw_weekly_demand_staticweek wg1
where 
staticweekno between 1 and 4
group by weekstart
order by weekstart

with top4brandforecastsale as 
(
select brand,sum(peakforecast * lastknownrrp) forecastsale ,weekend
from 
demandai.vw_sku_forecast_with_lastrrp_staticweek sf
where 
sf.staticweekno between 0 and 1
and brand in (select brandwise from demandai.vw_lastweektop4brand  )
group by brand,weekend
)
select brand,forecastsale,weekend from top4brandforecastsale
union
select slm.skuvariant3 as brandwise,sum(sd.demand*sd.lastknownrrp) totalsales,weekstart
FROM demandai.vw_weekly_demand_staticweek sd
 inner JOIN demandai.sku_loc_metadata slm ON slm.skuid::text = sd.skuid::text AND slm.locationid::text = sd.locationid::text
where 
slm.skustatus = true 
and sd.staticweekno between 0 and 1 
and slm.skuvariant3 in (select brandwise from demandai.vw_lastweektop4brand)
group by slm.skuvariant3,weekstart

select sum(forecastsalesamt) from demandai.vw_demand_variation
 where 
 percentavgchg >=10

select weekstart,sum((currentstock - maxstocklevel)*lastknownrrp) as capitalatrisk
from demandai.vw_weekly_demand_staticweek
where
staticweekno =1
and 
currentstock != maxstocklevel
group by weekstart
union all
select weekstart,sum((currentstock - maxstocklevel)*lastknownrrp) as capitalatrisk
from demandai.vw_weekly_demand_staticweek
where
staticweekno =2 and 
currentstock > maxstocklevel
group by weekstart

select count(distinct skuid) overstocksku 
from demandai.vw_weekly_demand_staticweek
where
staticweekno =1
and currentstock > maxstocklevel

select count(distinct skuid) from demandai.vw_demand_variation
 where 
 percentavgchg >=10

select coalesce(sum(demand * lastknownrrp), 0) currweeksales
 from  demandai.vw_weekly_demand_staticweek
 where 
 staticweekno = 0

select weekstart,sum((maxstocklevel - currentstock  )*lastknownrrp) as salesatrisk 
from demandai.vw_weekly_demand_staticweek
where
staticweekno =1
and 
currentstock < minstocklevel
group by weekstart
union all
select weekstart,sum((maxstocklevel - currentstock)*lastknownrrp) as salesatrisk 
from demandai.vw_weekly_demand_staticweek
where
staticweekno =2 and 
currentstock < minstocklevel
group by weekstart
